roleset.name: to minimize the importance of

example.name: passive
example.text: While [[*] renewing military aid]-1 had been considered []-1 out of the question , [*-1] rejected [*] by Congress and deemphasized [*] by the Bush administration , Mr. Ortega 's statement provides Contra supporters with the opportunity [*] to press the administration on the issue .

roleset.note: DEEMPHASIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'deemphasize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from deemphasize.01-v predicate notes)
